connect.promptForNameMessage: Before starting a live chat, please tell me your name?
connect.waitingForAgentMessage: Thanks for waiting. An agent will be with you when available.

lex.initialText: You can ask me for help ordering flowers. Just type "Buy flowers" or click on the mic and say it.

languageDisclaimer.content: Please select your preferred language for the chat interface. By choosing a language, you acknowledge that translations may not be entirely accurate and that important information should be verified in your native language. For more information about language support and translation accuracy
languageDisclaimer.fullContent:
Full Language Disclaimer

This chat interface provides translations to multiple languages to assist users in communicating more effectively. However, please be aware of the following:

  • Translations are generated automatically and may not always be 100% accurate.
  • Complex or idiomatic expressions may not translate well.
  • Technical or specialized terminology might not be correctly translated in all languages.
  • The context of a conversation can sometimes be lost in translation.

For critical information or important decisions, we strongly recommend verifying the information in your native language or seeking assistance from a professional translator.

By using the translation feature, you acknowledge and accept these limitations. Our organization is not responsible for any misunderstandings or consequences resulting from inaccurate translations.

If you have any questions or concerns about the translation feature, please contact our support team.
